slides.title: Lie or sit. Relax. Take five breaths.
slides.subTitle: SubTitle1

slides.title: Lift toes up. Hold. Release.
slides.subTitle: SubTitle1

slides.title: Curl toes down. Hold. Release.
slides.subTitle: SubTitle1

slides.title: Clench hands. Hold. Release.
slides.subTitle: SubTitle1

slides.title: Tense arms. Hold. Release.
slides.subTitle: SubTitle1

slides.title: Tighten abs. Hold. Release.
slides.subTitle: SubTitle1

slides.title: Lift shoulders. Hold. Release.
slides.subTitle: SubTitle1

slides.title: Open mouth. Hold. Release.
slides.subTitle: SubTitle1

slides.title: Shut eyes tight. Hold. Release.
slides.subTitle: SubTitle1

slides.title: Quiet Space
slides.subTitle: Find a peaceful, undisturbed spot to sit or lie down.

slides.title: Eyes Closed
slides.subTitle: Shut your eyes to minimize distractions.

slides.title: Breathe Deeply
slides.subTitle: Inhale through your nose and exhale through your mouth a few times for relaxation.

slides.title: Visualize Peace
slides.subTitle: Picture a calming place like a forest, beach, or meadow.

slides.title: Focus on Imagery
slides.subTitle: Envision the vibrant colors and unique features of your peaceful place.

slides.title: Use Your Senses
slides.subTitle: Hear nature sounds, feel warmth or breezes, and smell the environment.

slides.title: Feel Calmness
slides.subTitle: Let serenity from the scene wash over you.

slides.title: Stay Centered
slides.subTitle: Maintain focus on your visualization. Redirect wandering thoughts.

slides.title: Transition Out
slides.subTitle: Gradually become aware of your surroundings, moving fingers and toes.

slides.title: Eyes Open
slides.subTitle: Gently open your eyes when ready.

slides.title: Notice 5 things that you can see.
slides.subTitle: How does it look? Do you notice any patterns on it? What's the most prominent color?

slides.title: Notice 4 things that you can touch.
slides.subTitle: How does it feel? What's the texture like? What is it made of?

slides.title: Notice 3 things that you can hear.
slides.subTitle: How loud is it? What is it saying? Where is it coming from?

slides.title: Notice 2 things that you can smell.
slides.subTitle: What are the notes of the scent? Is it strong, or is it subtle?

slides.title: Notice 1 thing that you can taste
slides.subTitle: What's the flavor profile?
